definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: Ne 13:19) door (NH id.; As. daltu(m) Strm:Av 1843 Schr:COT Gloss; Ph. pl. [[דלהת]] CIS:i. 7. 3; —acc. to Ba:ZMG 1887, 607 fr. √ [[ידל]], As. edilu, to bolt, bar)—[[דֶּלֶת]] (always abs., and c. art. exc. Ct So 8:9 + Ez Eze 41:24 but here Co art.) Ge 19:10 + 18 t.; [[דָָּלֶת]] Ge 19:9, Ju Jdg 19:22; sf. [[דַּלְתּוֹ]] 2Ki 12:10; Du. [[דְּלָתַיִם]] (cf. Sta:§ 187 a) De 3:5 + 9 t., [[דְּתָָיִם]] Job 38:10; cstr. [[דַּלְתֵי]] Jos 2:19 + 6 t. + Ez Eze 26:2 Co; sf. [[דְּלָתַי]] Job 31:32, [[דְּלָתֶיךָ]] Zec 11:1 + Is 26:20 Kt (cf. [[דָּלָה]] n.f.), [[דְּלָתֶיהָ]] Jos 6:26, 1Ki 16:34; pl. [[דְּלָתוֹת]] Je 36:23 + 10 t.; cstr. [[דַּלְתוֹת]] Ju Jdg 3:23 + 19 t. + Ez Eze 26:2 (Co [[דלתי]]); sf. [[דַּלְתׂתַי]] Pr 8:34, [[דַּלְתוֹתָיו]] 2Ch 3:7, 2Ch 4:22; [[דַּלְתׂתָיו]] Ne 3:1, Ne 3:3, Ne 3:6, Ne 3:13, Ne 3:14, Ne 3:15; [[דַּלְתוֹתֵהֶם]] 2Ch 4:9;

door of house (disting. fr. door-way, cf. 1Ki 6:31 [[פֶּתַח]] Ge 19:6) Ge 19:9, Ge 19:10, Ex 2:6 (all JE) De 15:17, Jos 2:19 (JE) Ju Jdg 11:31, Jdg 19:22, Jdg 19:27, 1Sa 21:14 ([[דלתות השׁער]]) 2Ki 4:4, 2Ki 4:5, 2Ki 6:32, 2Ki 6:32, Is 57:8, Job 31:32; so fig. of wisdom's house Pr 8:34 [[לִשְׁקׂד עַל־דַּלְתׂתַי]]; partic. doors of house of ´[[י]] 1Sa 3:15 (´[[הֵיכַל י]] v:1Sa 3:3); temple 1Ki 6:34, 1Ki 6:34, 1Ki 6:34, 1Ki 7:50, 2Ki 18:16, 1Ch 22:3, 2Ch 3:7, 2Ch 4:22, 2Ch 28:24, 2Ch 29:3, Ne 6:10, Mal 1:10; so of Ezek.'s temple, Ez Eze 41:23, Eze 41:24, Eze 41:24, Eze 41:24, Eze 41:24, Eze 41:24, Eze 41:25.

door of room Ju Jdg 3:23, Jdg 3:24, Jdg 3:25, 2Sa 13:17, 2Sa 13:18, 2Ki 4:33, 2Ki 9:3, 2Ki 9:10. esp. doors of [[דביר]] or [[קדשׁים]] ´[[ק]] 1Ki 6:31, 1Ki 6:32, 1Ki 7:50, 2Ch 4:22 cf. also Ez Eze 41:23; also of court [[עֲזׇרָה]] 2Ch 4:9, 2Ch 4:9, and of porch [[אוּלָם]] 2Ch 29:7.

gates of city De 3:5, Jos 6:26 (cf. 1K 1Ki 16:34) Ju Jdg 16:3, 1Sa 23:7, 2Ch 8:5, 2Ch 14:6, Ne 3:1, Ne 3:3, Ne 3:6, Ne 3:13, Ne 3:14, Ne 3:15, Ne 6:1, Ne 7:1 (´[[ד]] then generally distinct fr. [[שׁער]], wh. denotes the whole structure of gate, incl. posts, open space, etc., while ´[[ד]] is swinging door), Ne 7:3, Ne 13:19 (where also sense narrower than ‖[[שׁעת]]) Is 45:1 (‖[[שׁערים]]) cf. v:Is 45:2 and Ps 107:16; Je 49:31, Ez Eze 38:11.

in other senses (mostly fig.): door (prob. lid) of chest 2Ki 12:10; aperture of womb Job 3:10 ([[בטני]] ´[[ד]]); jaws of crocodile Job 41:6 ([[פניו]] ´[[ד]]); lips of man Ec 12:4; doors enclosing and shutting off sea Job 38:8, Job 38:10; doors of heaven through wh. comes rain Ps 78:23 (cf. ´[[אֲרֻבּׂת השׁ]] Ge 7:11); of column of MS. (from shape) Je 36:23; fig. of easily accessible woman, Ct So 8:9; in simile Pr 26:14; of Jerus. as gate of people Ez Eze 26:2; of Lebanon Zec 11:1.
